# textElement(for:)

**Instance Method**

Returns the text element corresponding to object’s attributed string.

## Declaration

```swift
func textElement(for attributedString: NSAttributedString) -> NSTextElement?
```

## Parameters

- **attributedString**: The attributed string to map into an [doc://com.apple.appkit/documentation/AppKit/NSTextElement].

## Return Value

An [doc://com.apple.appkit/documentation/AppKit/NSTextElement], or `nil`.

## Discussion

Returns `nil` when `attributedString` contains attributes not mappable to [doc://com.apple.appkit/documentation/AppKit/NSTextElement].

## Managing text elements

- **attributedString(for:)**: Returns a new attributed string for the text element.
